content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/848a357b-1dda-4fa0-8d69-bd085f12f3b4/image2019-1-23_13-28-5.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":760,\"height\":191}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":599200,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/193bbfbe-3d1d-4f50-8492-b9b67a77b866/10808.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/193bbfbe-3d1d-4f50-8492-b9b67a77b866/10808.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"10808.jpg\",\"name\":\"10808.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"193bbfbe-3d1d-4f50-8492-b9b67a77b866\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1028.9931640625,\"height\":306.57602973206514},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/848a357b-1dda-4fa0-8d69-bd085f12f3b4/image2019-1-23_13-28-5.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":760,\"height\":191}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Welcome to 'Bench Time Management Program'\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You are receiving this training because you have been confirmed by your Resource/Engineering Manager (RM/EM) as a candidate available for new opportunities at EPAM. You've been identified as a valuable employee, therefore, we'd like to continue our partnership and help you to achieve your professional goals within EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the following days you will be contacted by our Bench Management Team for a follow up session to further discuss your professional aspirations, business priorities, and potential opportunities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What you will learn:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What does it mean to be part of the Bench Time Management Program?\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What support will be provided by our EPAM Staffing + Bench Management team\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Expectations of you while you are 'on bench'\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What is available to you on career advancement\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
